```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# download file(parquet) from web to current directry

curl_download(
  "http://github.com/cwida/duckdb-data/releases/download/v1.0/lineitemsf1.snappy.parquet",
  "lineitems.parquet"
)
```

```{r}
# make tibble/arrow table from parquet file by arrow package

library(arrow)

tb=read_parquet('lineitems.parquet',as_data_frame = T)

class(tb)
head(tb)
```
